name: Pascal Stichler
description: I am doing research on Ethereum protocol-level economics and incentive design. Currently, I mainly working on APS (esp. Execution Tickets) and multi-block MEV. Previous work included data analysis on blobs and the effects of EIP-4844 on Layer 2s. In my former life I co-founded a tradFi business automating the M&A process for SME companies.
